backend/main.mo: Defines types and implements backend storage, rate limiting, user profiles, and access control using persistent authorization state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing admin/auth messaging requirements and the related frontend file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of various frontend components, pages, data files, and SEO utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base theme variables and dark mode tokens defining the app’s color system and global styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry file loading the React app and main script.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots.txt allowing all crawlers and referencing the sitemap URL.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing main site URLs with change frequency and priority.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps the app with ThemeProvider, and renders the router and Toaster.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminAcces: Admin access code entry panel storing the token in session storage and reloading to trigger auth initialization.
Admin access denied screen with retry, sign-out, return-home options, plus the access code entry panel.
Controls admin access flow, handling authentication, admin checks, profile setup, and loading states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Displays an Internet Identity login UI for administrators with a sign‑in button and loading state.
frontend/src/components/admin/backup/Bac: Provides backup export and import tools with JSON preview, file download, validation, and restore actions.
frontend/src/components/admin/pages/Page: CRUD interface for creating, editing, and deleting custom pages, including metadata and content.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProfileSet: Modal prompting new admins to enter profile details and save them via a mutation.
frontend/src/components/admin/promotions: CRUD interface for managing promotional banners, including creation, editing, ordering, and deletion.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/A: Admin UI for viewing, editing, and saving WhatsApp, call, and order button configurations.
frontend/src/components/admin/settings/S: Admin panel for updating location details and managing opening hours with add/remove functionality.
frontend/src/components/branding/Section: Reusable layout components for page sections and headers with optional patterns and styling.
frontend/src/components/FindUs/GoogleMap: Embeds a responsive Google Maps iframe using the configured URL.
frontend/src/components/forms/CateringEv: Form for submitting catering event requests with validation, mutation handling, and success/error alerts.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Contact form handling name, email, and message submission with validation and mutation feedback.
frontend/src/components/forms/Reservatio: Reservation request form for collecting guest info, date, and special requests with validation.
frontend/src/components/gallery/GalleryG: Image grid that displays gallery items and opens a lightbox when an image is selected.
frontend/src/components/home/FeaturedCat: Renders a grid of predefined food categories with icons and links to the menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer showing brand info, quick links, contact details, hours, and social links with dynamic custom pages.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation links, custom pages, logo, and mobile drawer menu.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main layout wrapping header, promotions strip, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuFilters: Category filter tabs allowing selection of menu categories including 'all'.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuList.ts: Grid list of menu items showing name, price, description, and optional tags.
frontend/src/components/promotions/Promo: Displays active promotions with dismiss controls ordered by priority.
frontend/src/config/site.ts: Static site configuration including contact info, hours, social links, and metadata.
frontend/src/data/gallery.ts: Defines the GalleryItem type and provides sample gallery image data.
frontend/src/data/menu.ts: Defines menu categories and static menu items with metadata for use in the UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPages.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, and deleting custom pages, invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminPromotions.ts: Implements CRUD hooks for promotions, including fetching all promotions and invalidating caches after updates.
Contains mutations for updating site settings like location, opening hours, and button configs with query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminStatus.ts: Fetches admin status and current user profile using the actor, handling unauthorized responses gracefully.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackupRestore.ts: Provides export and import mutation hooks for full data backup and restoration with global query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useCustomPages.ts: Fetches all custom pages or a single page by slug using backend actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useGalleryData.ts: Returns static gallery data via React Query as a placeholder for future backend integration.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Manages Internet Identity authentication state, providing identity, login/logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenuData.ts: Serves static menu categories and items through React Query until backend menu CRUD is added.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Returns static SEO config for a given page key via React Query with future backend support planned.
frontend/src/hooks/usePromotions.ts: Fetches currently active promotions from the backend actor with placeholder fallback behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query mutations for submitting contact, reservation, and catering event data using an actor and invalidates related query caches.
frontend/src/hooks/useSiteSettings.ts: Provides queries to fetch site location, opening hours, and button configurations with placeholder data when the actor is unavailable.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind base styles and defines custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including color palettes and background patterns.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO settings and structured sections describing the restaurant's story, mission, cuisine, and services.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminPage.tsx: Defines the admin dashboard with authentication, logout handling, and multiple admin panels organized into tabs.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays the contact page with a form, SEO metadata, business schema, and dynamic contact and opening hour details.
frontend/src/pages/CustomPage.tsx: Fetches and renders custom CMS-style pages by slug with SEO metadata and loading or not‑found states.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows the gallery page with SEO settings and a grid of images loaded via gallery data hooks.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with a hero section, featured categories, and highlights of the restaurant's offerings using SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/MenuPage.tsx: Implements a menu page with filters, SEO metadata, and dynamically filtered menu items loaded from a data hook.
frontend/src/pages/OrderReservePage.tsx: Renders a reservations and catering page with SEO setup and tabbed forms for table reservations and catering requests.
frontend/src/seo/LocalBusinessJsonLd.tsx: Generates and injects JSON-LD structured data for the restaurant using site settings and fallback values.
frontend/src/seo/seoConfig.ts: Provides default and per-page SEO configurations including titles, descriptions, keywords, and Open Graph images.
frontend/src/seo/useSeo.ts: React hook that updates document title and meta tags for SEO, Open Graph, Twitter cards, and canonical URLs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in session storage, and clearing them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, architectural notes, existing features, and known issues such as admin access failures.
